name: Yuwa Gram Vikas Mandal
briefDescription: Yuva Gram Vikas Mandal (Yuva Gram) was formed by a group of young activists. The organization emerged in 1985 with the objective of overall development of society and started its activities form 'Warapgaon' village. The constructive community development process was enhanced after 1995 at the organizational level. In due course of the time the organization contributed significantly towards the socio-economic development of the poor and underprivileged.As a token of its contribution, the organization was honoured with 'National Youth Award' in the year of 2001 for its contribution towards youth development in Beed district of Maharashtra. Today, it is a well-recognized organization.VISION :Yuva Gram deems a society where in social justice and equality exist in spite of cast, creed, language, race and religion. We believe in a society where in the poor, the marginalized and the under privileged have equal opportunity to take part in developmental process.GOAL:Yuva Gram aims at building capacities of poor and needy people in general and youth, women, dalits, tribals, small and marginal farmers, widow and destitute women and orphan children with a view to furthering their socio- economic conditions with special reference to health, natural resource management and constitutional rights.
